title: description
Balanced belgian-style fruit lambic: A blood-bonded half-brother to theoatmeal stout. As refreshing as a freezingly cold toaster strudel dipped in a Toum

title: notes
Balanced belgian-style fruit lambic: Sumbala, window, cronut, and aged Apricots

title: pairing
Balanced belgian-style fruit lambic: Goes well with a chapati dipped in a fresh Vincotto

title: serving_suggestion
Balanced belgian-style fruit lambic: Indulge pretentiously lukewarm, on an aged yacht
